exude verb [T]
(FEELING)

exude verb [T]
(LIQUID/SMELL)
to produce a smell or liquid substance from inside: exude something from something Some trees exude from their bark a sap that repels insect parasites.

to have a lot of a particular quality or feeling: Sal exudes confidence.
To exude is also to produce from the inside and spread out slowly: Some trees exude a sap that repels insect parasites.
